creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: red flared dress with extensive multicolored embroidery on front and at neck button and silk tassel tie at neck; tapered long sleeve extensions with fuchsia and green silk tassels at end; edges bordered with sequins; horizontal striped hem facing; two pairs of snaps on lower sleeve extensions (for fastening in back?)
dimension:
53 x 46 in. (134.62 x 116.84 cm)
49 in. (124.46 cm) (object part, cuff to cuff)
2 1/2 in. (6.35 cm) (object part, tassel)
title: Dress
